title: Perencanaan keuangan Bapak Edi Gunawan pada Tabungan Bank BCA, Deposito BCA, Schroder Dana Liquid, Trimegah Dana Stabil, Pratama Kombinasi, Mandiri Investa Atraktif, Schroder Dana Istimewa, Dan Manulife Saham Andalan
abstract: Determining the target of specific finance represent step early in a monetary planning of family which totally. Determining the target of family finance matching with desire of[is each family member require conference which in. Each;Every individual in sure family have difference in so many matter and also preferensi. For the reason in determining the target of family finance required by opermess and also agreement of family member specially father and mother to bring or lead family in ftiture. Methodologies which is used in this research compile finance which in owning Mr. Edi by using three step, that is survey, and interview of questionary The basic purpose of this planning is to help or assistant the client in achieving their financial goals. In this case, the asset allocation has become the top priority on the Mr. Edi financial proposal. As such,the goals of this scheme can be attained by using some of the mutual fund products which are able to provide better results in the certain periode of time depands on the necessities.
contributors: Sautma Ronni Basana (Advisor and Examination Committee)
